page.title: 01Gazetteer, St.Austell
page.content: Population of the town in 1985 is approximately 19,13O. Early Closing day is Thursday and Market Day is Tuesday. The town serves as an administration and residential area for the China Clay industry and E.C.L.P. has it's headquarters here. Local surrounding villages use the shopping facilities provided in the town, although many people travel to Plymouth by road and rail for shopping for larger items of household goods. Local government at district level is run by The Restormel Borough Council which is unique in Cornwall, being the only borough council still retaining it's Mayor.
